Eclipse is the IDE of choice for Android. Other IDEs won\'t provide all the Android development tools that Eclipse does.
Android emulators can be controlled externally via a telnet session.
The Traceview tool automatically collects and displays line coverage information when you run Junit test cases on your Android applications.

Some Android applications depend on recent Java features, such as the try-with-resources statement. Therefore, it is important to make sure that you\'ve installed the latest version of Java in your development environment.
Android Virtual Devices can be created to mimic specific physical devices, such as a Nexus One, or a Galaxy Nexus tablet.
One of the main jobs of the Activity class is to support concurrent access to shared, inter-application data.
The Fragment class is a subclass of the Activity class and replaces Activities on large screen devices such as Tablets.
An AutoCompleteTextView is a subclass of ViewGroup
When a user long clicks on a View that has registered to show a Context Menu, onCreateContextMenu(). methods will be called
manifest is the outermost xml tag used in the AndroidManifest.xml file
c++/c programming languages are Android\'s Native libraries typically
Location Manager provide to applications User movement and User location.
A mobile app is a software that runs on a mobile device
In android,objects of the ContentValue class are used to insert rolls into the database
When a cursor is no longer required,it cannot be closed
